content: niina laitinen designed these ankle-length summer socks for the novita 7 veljestä yarn they are easy and quick to make an ideal summer present the pattern is here in finnish https //novita com/patterns/madeleine--pitsisukat here in english https //novita com/en/search q=madeleine+socks&tab=pattern and here in swedish https //novita com/sv/patterns/madeleine-sockorna
